description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are a game character who has escaped to the real world. Why are you here? Who let you out along with an army of evil creatures? Solve puzzles, watch your ammo, find better guns, kill enemies and uncover the mysteries around every corner of this strange house. Music: purple-planet.com
